```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(naniar)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

Load data in
```{r}
sharktank <-readr::read_csv("data/Shark Tank US dataset.csv")
```

Take a look
```{r}
glimpse(sharktank)
```

clean the names
```{r}
sharktank <- clean_names(sharktank)
names(sharktank)
```
